section.title: PCG C++ Committee Member
content: - Participate in Tencent engineer promotion assessment; Participate in planning Tencent's technical blueprint in AI/ML; Contribute code to the Tencent company level infrastructure.

section.title: Deep Learning Framework Senior Expert
content: - Member of [Tencent's Hunyuan LLM (混元大语言模型)](https://hunyuan.tencent.com/).
- One of the core founders of Tencent PCG's heterogeneous machine learning platform, which focuses on LLM and AIGC for [Tencent Zenvideo (智影)](https://zenvideo.qq.com/) and game products.

- One of the core founders of Tencent PCG's heterogeneous machine learning platform, [Numerous (无量)](https://developer.nvidia.com/zh-cn/blog/nvidia-accelerates-tencent-pcg-recommender-system/), which focuses on large-scale recommendation model training and inference for [QQ](https://im.qq.com/index/?from=qqnews), [Tencent Video](https://v.qq.com/), and [QQ Music](https://y.qq.com/). Numerous (无量) handle over 10 billion queries per day.
- Main Architect of international federated learning framework for [GameLoop](https://www.gameloop.com/).

- As [HugeCTR](https://github.com/NVIDIA/HugeCTR) contributor, [developed in cooperation with the NVIDIA team](https://developer.nvidia.com/zh-cn/blog/merlin-hugectr-hierarchical-parameter-server-intro/), broke the world record in performance of the 2020 and 2021 MLPerf training framework.
- Award: 2021, 2022 Excellent Contributor in Tencent Open Source Collaboration Project.
- Award: 2020, 2022, 2023 Tencent Outstanding Contributor.
- Award: 2020 Tencent Excellence in R&D Award.
- Award: 2020, 2021, 2022, 2023 Tencent Excellent Employee.
- Award: 2020 Tencent Open Source Collaboration Award.

section.title: Deep Learning Platform Engineer
content: - Member of Autopilot project
- Developed AI and deep learning platform with: Graph optimization, Pruning, Deep Compression, Quantization, Distillation.
- Tuning operators on TVM with Machine Learning Algorithm like boosting, reinforcement learning.
- Developed TOPI of NPU.
- Research on hardware aware NAS on AutoML-keras.

section.title: Deep Learning Software Engineer
content: - Developed part of feature TensorRT (release: 4.0+, RC: 5.0+).
- cuDNN performance tuning.
- Tuning TensorRT performance with different models.
- Weights Quantification and calibration (INT8, INT4).
- Work in TensorRT project on DrivePX2, Jetson TX2/TX1 platform with Python and C++.
- Work in cuDNN project on DrivePX2, Jetson TX2/TX1 platform with Python and C++.
- Deploy models from other frameworks on TensorRT.
- Optimize inference speed on GPU.
- Develop fast kernel and extra layer plugin.
